name: @gdn/meteor-model
description: Implements a basic functionality to build Meteor models that hold business logic, validation and data persistance.

scripts.build: tsc || echo not ok && npm link && cd tests && npm link @gdn/meteor-model
scripts.test: npm run build && cd tests && meteor test --driver-package=practicalmeteor:mocha
scripts.citest: npm run build && cd tests && meteor test --once --driver-package dispatch:mocha-phantomjs

author: Guidion B.V.
